== Uses ==
== Uses ==

+
[[File:Galaxy Nexus smartphone.jpg|thumb|[[Galaxy Nexus]], the latest "[[Google Nexus|Google phone]]"]]
The open and customizable nature of the Android operating system allows it to be used in pretty much any electronics, including but not limited to: [[smartphone]]s, [[laptop]]s, [[netbook]]s, [[tablet computer]]s, [[Google TV]], [[wristwatch]]es,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://live.imwatch.it/ |title=i'm Watch |publisher=Live.imwatch.it |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref> [[headphones]],<ref>http://www.theregister.co.uk/2011/01/12/now_audio_admiral_touch/</ref> Car CD and DVD players<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.alibaba.com/showroom/car-player-android.html |title=Car Player Android-Car Player Android Manufacturers, Suppliers and Exporters on |publisher=Alibaba.com |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref> and other devices.<ref>{{cite web |url= http://mashable.com/2011/05/12/ice-cream-sandwich/ |title=Androids Unite: How Ice Cream Sandwich Will End the OS Schism |author=Jolie O'Dell |work=Mashable |date = 12 May 2011 |accessdate=9 June 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.engadget.com/2010/09/06/toshiba-ac100-android-smartbook-hits-the-united-kingdom/ |title=Toshiba AC100 Android smartbook hits the United Kingdom |author=Laura June |work=Engadget |date=6 September 2010 |accessdate=9 June 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/22665/run-android-on-your-netbook-or-desktop/ |title=Run Android on Your Netbook or Desktop |publisher=How-To Geek |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref>
The open and customizable nature of the Android operating system allows it to be used in pretty much any electronics, including but not limited to: [[smartphone]]s, [[laptop]]s, [[netbook]]s, [[tablet computer]]s, [[Google TV]], [[wristwatch]]es,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://live.imwatch.it/ |title=i'm Watch |publisher=Live.imwatch.it |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref> [[headphones]],<ref>http://www.theregister.co.uk/2011/01/12/now_audio_admiral_touch/</ref> Car CD and DVD players<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.alibaba.com/showroom/car-player-android.html |title=Car Player Android-Car Player Android Manufacturers, Suppliers and Exporters on |publisher=Alibaba.com |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref> and other devices.<ref>{{cite web |url= http://mashable.com/2011/05/12/ice-cream-sandwich/ |title=Androids Unite: How Ice Cream Sandwich Will End the OS Schism |author=Jolie O'Dell |work=Mashable |date = 12 May 2011 |accessdate=9 June 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.engadget.com/2010/09/06/toshiba-ac100-android-smartbook-hits-the-united-kingdom/ |title=Toshiba AC100 Android smartbook hits the United Kingdom |author=Laura June |work=Engadget |date=6 September 2010 |accessdate=9 June 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/22665/run-android-on-your-netbook-or-desktop/ |title=Run Android on Your Netbook or Desktop |publisher=How-To Geek |date= |accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref>
